Query.Q1: select ifnull(sum(quantity),0) as FootTraffic from app_branch_walkins where(start_date >= * StartDate * and start_date <= * EndDate * ) and(end_date >= * StartDate * and end_date <= * EndDate * )
Query.Q2: select sum(sid.quantity * sid.unit_price) as Sales from sales_invoice as si left join sales_invoice_detail as sid on si.id_sales_invoice = sid.id_sales_invoice where si.trans_date between * StartDate * and * EndDate *
